name: Sky Defender (SpaghettiLord)
description:
In this game you play as a turret shooting airplanes that will constantly drops soldier down to attack you. The goal is to survive as long as possible while getting a high score! 

     This is a recreation of an iPod game that I usually played on my iPod around 7to 10 years ago. I can't remember the name of the game, but it's basically this except with white background, black sprites, and no upgrades. Please comment if you do remember the name!
